sp_instance.title: Portal Experience
sp_instance.widget_parameters:
{ "html": { "value": "

Welcome to the Portal Experience Home Page 

The Portal Experience scoped app was developed as an extension for the Out-of-the-box (OOTB) Service Portal technology. This means:

  • "Plug & Play": No modifications on any portal pages are required
  • Fully compatible with all OOTB form and list ("data-table") widgets
  • Automated Test Framework compatibility
  • Configuration like Client Side UI Actions and Field Styles is done on the OOTB forms
", "displayValue": "

Welcome to the Portal Experience Home Page 

The Portal Experience scoped app was developed as an extension for the Out-of-the-box (OOTB) Service Portal technology. This means:

  • "Plug & Play": No modifications on any portal pages are required
  • Fully compatible with all OOTB form and list ("data-table") widgets
  • Automated Test Framework compatibility
  • Configuration like Client Side UI Actions and Field Styles is done on the OOTB forms
" } }
